author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Place the celeriac strips into a bowl along with the lemon and juice and toss to combine. Mix the double cream, mayonnaise and mustard together then stir into the celeriac. Season with salt and white pepper. Place in the fridge for a couple of hours for the flavours to develop before serving.
ingredients: ½ small celeriac, cut into thin strips,  ½ lemon, juice only,  2 tbsp double cream ,  3 tbsp good-quality mayonnaise,  2 tsp Dijon mustard,  salt and white pepper
